name: The Mannings Residence
description: You are in a dark room. This ink story follows you, the main character as you go around a mansion trying to escape it. Find clues on why you are here and when you got here. There is a deeper secret than you know. (Keep in mind this game is very short because this is just the beginning of the code.  I will update it and make it longer every few days. Once I'm done it will be very long. This is also my first ink game!)
